title: Sending ads right in the middle of gameplay
text: I can‚Äôt believe that this game will send an ad while your playing the game. Not after you complete a level. As tour playing an ad pops up. Then trying to hit the top corner X to exit the ad is so tricky. It takes a few attempts to even exit the game. I‚Äôm hesitant to update games because of things like this. This is a new problem after the update. I‚Äôll play again if you guys can change that up. It breaks concentration.

title: Was a five til the last update
text:
This game is silly, addictive fun. However, the last update introduced mid-ads that are disruptive to game play and can cause you to push forward when the ad clears regardless of input from the player. 

While I get that games need to have ads and whatnot. Putting them in the middle of a level is a bit much, especially when the transition between the interrupting ad and returning to the game is faulty.  

Like I said, a silly, fun game. If the midlevel ads go away or the transition between them and returning to game play improves the game might be worth playing again.

title: Ads in the middle of gameplay - not worth it
text: They literally insert ads in the middle of gameplay. As you‚Äôre playing, it cuts to a commercial. Then it comes back and you have to re-orient yourself and the screen isn‚Äôt responsive for the first second or two. Note to developers: NEVER put an ad right in the middle of gameplay. And absolutely don‚Äôt do it for every level, which is what this game is doing. I deleted it after 4 levels.
